About.Name: Melani Plett
About.AboutText: Hi, I am Melani Plett. I am a professor of electrical engineering and the Director of Engineering and Computer Science Programs at Seattle Pacific University.

Experience.ExperienceText: 28 years teaching engineering courses, 8 years as an electrical engienering department chair, and 7 years as the Director of Engineering and Computer Scienc.
Experience.EducationText: BSEE 1991, MSEE University of Washington 1993, PhD EE University of Washington 2000
Experience.Role: Professor and Chair of Electrical Engineering and Director of Engineering and Computer Science
